title: Secretary-General’s remarks at 2015 Small States Forum (UN - United Nations)
text: ( Source : UN - United Nations) Secretary-General 's remarks at 2015 Small States Forum Lima, Peru , 10 October 2015 I am pleased to be with you. Your membership is varied, but you share many common challenges. For those of you that are Small
